mapper.select: SELECT e.e_id, e.vaccum_date, e.work_type, (select code_name from common_code where code = e.work_type AND code_group='work_type') as work_type_name, e.vaccum, (select code_name from common_code where code = e.vaccum AND code_group='vaccum') as vaccum_name, DATE_FORMAT(e.start_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") start_time, DATE_FORMAT(e.end_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") end_time, e.vaccum_group, (select code_name from common_code where code = e.vaccum_group AND code_group='jab_class') as vaccum_group_name, e.weight1, e.weight2, e.weight3, e.total_production, e.cycle_time, e.is_check, e.check_user, e.check_date, e.created, e.last_modified, e.tunc_used FROM packing_vaccum e WHERE e.e_id = #{eId}

SELECT ep.ep_id, ep.vehicle_id, ep.production, (ep.production - 0) as complete, vm.kind, vm.product_name, vm.model_car, vm.lh_rh, vm.product_id, vm.client, e.tunc_used FROM packing_vaccum e LEFT JOIN packing_vaccum_produce ep ON (e.e_id=ep.e_id) LEFT JOIN vehicle_management vm ON (ep.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id) WHERE e.e_id = #{eId}

choose.when: AND REPLACE(e.vaccum_date, '-', '') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{dateStart}, '-', '') AND REPLACE(#{dateEnd}, '-', '')

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM packing_vaccum e LEFT JOIN packing_vaccum_produce ep ON (e.e_id=ep.e_id) LEFT JOIN vehicle_management vm ON (ep.vehicle_id = vm.vehicle_id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO packing_vaccum (vaccum_date, work_type, vaccum, start_time, end_time, vaccum_group, total_production, created, last_modified, tunc_used) VALUES (STR_TO_DATE(#{vaccumDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{workType}, #{vaccum}, STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), #{vaccumGroup}, #{totalProduction}, now(), now(), #{tuncUsed})
INSERT INTO packing_vaccum_produce (e_id, vehicle_id, production) VALUES (#{eId}, #{vehicleId}, #{production})
